attributes.action: We just want equal rights to be equal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a white, middle aged person, who has no disability, who is employed, who pays taxes, who likes everyone, but has no special rights and is feeling as though I am being pushed out of everything

rejection.details: Please provide a more explicit action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
